Cheik Ndoluvualu, onye a na-akpọ Cheik Ledy (1962–1997), bụ onye Congo na-ese ihe
A mụrụ ya na Kinto M’Vuila, Democratic Republic of Congo

Cheik Ledy mụrụ ọrụ n'aka nwanne ya nwoke nke okenye, onye na-ese ihe ịrịba ama Chéri Samba, mgbe ọ hapụrụ ụlọ akwụkwọ na 1977, ma rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye enyemaka Samba ruo afọ iri na ụlọ ọrụ Kinshasa ya. Dị ka Samba, ihe osise Ledy na-ekwu maka nsogbu mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke oge ya
Ọrụ ya na-ese okwu gụnyere ihe osise akara na iji condom na ọrụ
Ọ nwụrụ n'ihi nsogbu metụtara ọrịa AIDS na 1997 na Kinshasa.
Ihe osise Ledy na-egosipụtakarị ihe osise na-eji agba na-egbuke egbuke

Ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'ụdị eserese akara ma jiri ederede French na Lingala. Ọrụ ndị a ma ama gụnyere "Non comprendre" (Agaghị m aghọta) (1995), "Arrosage" (Mmiri) (1995), "Absence de morale" (Moral Absence) (1990).
